name: virtuoso
author: Akshaj Jagarapu
description: Free JavaScript classes brimming with critical thinking activities, enriching code labs, inspiring projects, and more. Learn quintessential skills required for competing in this age of technology.

scripts.start: npm run reset && npm run format && gatsby build && cp -R public govirtuoso.org && gatsby serve
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm i gatsby-theme-material-ui
